titles.title: State Infrastructure Bank Expansion Act

To amend the National Highway System Designation Act of 1995 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of the feasibility of expanding the types of projects eligible for assistance from State infrastructure banks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. State Infrastructure Bank Expansion Act - Amends the National Highway System Designation Act of 1995 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to: (1) conduct a study of the feasibility of expanding the types of projects eligible for assistance from State infrastructure banks; (2) identify appropriations accounts which could be used to provide funding to State infrastructure banks for such projects; (3) establish an advisory committee; and (4) report to the Congress.
